text: Viking Hockey is an ice hockey team based in Stavanger, Norway. The club was founded in 1998, replacing Viking IK, which had folded in 1996. They played one season in the GET-ligaen, 1998-99. The team colors are blue and they play home matches in Siddishallen. ==Famous players== *Rob Schistad *Eirik Cecil Paulsen *Kyle McDonough *Tore Vikingstad *Ed Galliani ==See also== *Stavanger Oilers ==External links== * Category:Ice hockey teams in Norway Category:Sport in Stavanger Category:1998 establishments in Norway Category:Viking Age in popular culture
title: Viking Hockey
